hackathon-description-text: Come together with the Swarthmore community and build awesome technology for 12 hours! Meals and swag provided, snazzy prizes to be won. Hacking will commence in SCI 101.
hackathon-rules:
Technical difficulty
Impact
Innovation
Cool Factor

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $200 Amazon Gift Vouchers for the best hack/website submitted on a .TECH domain
Professional Studio Headphones for each member of the team
Google Home Minis for each member of the teams
Google Home Minis for each member of the teams

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=500 College Ave, Swarthmore, PA 19081, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Did the hack tackle a difficult technical problem? This can reward projects that
might be difficult conceptually but area great ideas. We love original ideas that
are ambitious and unique.

Does the hack have a social/worldly impact? Will it influence change in a
community or area? We want to reward people for thinking about others, and
making the world a better place.

Is the hack a novel solution, or something clever that you haven’t seen or
thought of before? Ideas along these lines are exciting and fun in their use of
technology.

Did something really just knock-your-socks-off? This can be felt more often
than explained, and is sometimes different for different people.

hackathon-description-header: Come join an international day of hacking on Swarthmore's campus
